author: adzel-werk
body:
#### PR description:

Adds a small, Python3 compatible utility to query `Configuration.AlCa.autoCond`. 
Features: `argparse` CLI, CMSSW environment check, list keys, get key, pattern filter, JSON output, and clear error codes. 

#### PR validation:

```bash
printAutoCond.py --list
printAutoCond.py --key run2_design --json
printAutoCond.py --pattern run2
```
title: Add utility to inspect autoCond
